entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor / remove RunTests #63413
  • SyntaxGenerator crashes with 'checked' operators #63410
    C# 12.0
  • LSIF tool backward incompatibility #63409
  • CS4033 creates invalid code on partial methods #63404
  • Hot Reload doesn't work if Razor class library has a view with the same name as the web app #63399
    17.4

Closed

  • Interfaces don't forward static members to other interfaces #62855
    17.4
  • SelectMany returning `null` crashes the generator driver #63266
    17.4
  • Does not support unicode greater than 9999 in a regular expression #63228
    17.4
  • Inconsistent behaviour with source generator results between unit testing and launch profile #63353
  • Update License for Roslyn compilers script GenerateSdkPackages to MIT #63257
    17.4
  • Allow stepping through object init blocks #63383
  • CS8600 - false positive when working with nullable values that are 'Not NULL here' #63401
  • Split Comment option in VS Tools->Options is mistakenly bound to Split String option #63309
  • Allow making attributes suppress warnings with `(Unconditional)SuppressMessage` #60938
  • Compiler warns about using not-null `string` in `ValueTuple` declared as `string?` in `switch` statement #61487
  • Analyzer Errors should not be filtered out by /p:WarningLevel=0 when Ruleset Rule is set to Action=Error #61603
  • IDE0230 (Convert to UTF-8 string literal) doesn't work #63380
  • SourceGenerator is too slow #63397

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in ref escape around missing this param #63414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add 'cancel current batch' capabilities to async-batching-work-queus. #63412
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Dont throw on null return #63267
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Install a .NET 6 runtime for the MSBuild Workspace unit tests. #63369
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Relax assert in CodeGenerator.EmitConversion() #63403
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • Improve classification test harness output #63407
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • only publish build validation logs on failure #63405
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove GenerateSdkPackages #63314
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #63354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Regression test for ref struct in iterator #63415
    Area-Compilers
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Upgrade LSP version #63341
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pass SolutionServices in more places #63398
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move DesignerAttribute scanning off of SolutionCrawler #63190
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #63197
    Area-IDE
  • Change the search of local function to non-recursive version #63338
    Area-IDE
  • Use non-recursive DFS when visit binary expression #63374
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix moving nested type to another file from an interface #63274
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix crash in parameter refactoring #63351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
